mapper.select: select ID, OPER, PHONENUMBER, SHIPPINGPAYMENTTYPE, COMPANYNAME, PERSONNAME, SITEID, COUNTRYCODE, FEDERALTAXID, ADDRESSLINE, OPERFLAG, POSTALCODE, OPERTIME, SHIPPERACCOUNTNUMBER, CITY, COUNTRYNAME, LANGUAGECODE, PASSWORD, DUTYPAYMENTTYPE from DB_DHLUSER where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
